## Setup

Code from <https://github.com/sol-eng/plumber-mode/>

```{r}
library(plumber)
library(jsonlite)
```

## Create Model

Train linear model to predict miles per gallon and save as RDS.

```{r}
cars_model <- lm(mpg ~ cyl + hp, data = mtcars)
saveRDS(cars_model, "cars-model.rds")
```
